name: learning_rate
short_descr: Learning rate shrinks the contribution of each tree by learning_rate.

name: n_estimators
short_descr: The number of boosting stages to perform.

name: subsample
short_descr: The fraction of samples to be used for fitting the individual base learners.

name: min_weight_fraction_leaf
short_descr: The minimum weighted fraction of the sum total of weights (of all the input samples) required to be at a leaf node.

name: max_depth
short_descr: Maximum depth of the individual regression estimators.
